item.title: AWS S3 Backend | Stash
item.description: AWS S3 Stash supports AWS S3 service or S3 compatible services like Minio servers, Rook Object store as a backend. item.title: Backend Overview | Stash
item.description: New to Stash? Please start here. Stash Backends Backend is where Stash stores backup snapshots. It can be a cloud storage like GCS bucket, AWS S3, Azure Blob Storage etc. or a Kubernetes persistent volume like HostPath, PersistentVolumeClaim, NFS etc. Below diagram show how Stash sidecar container access and store backup data into a backend storage. Stash sidecar container receive backend information from spec.backend field of Restic crd. It obtains necessary credentials to access the backend from the secret specified in spec.
